logicId.Wiki: Set the ID of the logic created by the script.

searchTargetLv1ForgetTime.Wiki: Search enemy Lv1 Target Time to forget.

searchTargetLv2ForgetTime.Wiki: Search enemy Lv2 time to forget the target.

BackHomeLife_OnHitEneWal.AltName: Back Home Time on Touching Enemy Wall
BackHomeLife_OnHitEneWal.Wiki: The life of the BackToHome goal when it touches an enemy wall that blocks the block

SightTargetForgetTime.Wiki: Time to forget the visual target.

idAttackCannotMove.Wiki: An action that automatically takes place when a destructible object stops it.

callHelp_CallActionId.Wiki: Action ID (EzStateAnimID) when calling a friend

isGuard_Act.Wiki: Whether to guard against actions (assumed when returning home, looking toward the target)

ear_soundcut_dist.Wiki: The distance to reduce the size of the sound source. You will not hear any sound below this distance.

nonBattleActLife.AltName: Non-Battle Act Duration when in Combat

BackHome_LookTargetTime.AltName: Retreat Home - Look for Target Time
BackHome_LookTargetTime.Wiki: When returning home: Time to look at the target [sec]

BackHome_LookTargetDist.AltName: Retreat Home - Look for Target Distance
BackHome_LookTargetDist.Wiki: When returning home: Distance to see the target [m]

SoundTargetForgetTime.Wiki: Time to forget the sound target.

callHelp_CallPeerId.Wiki: Companion group ID to call a companion

targetSys_DmgEffectRate.Wiki: Damage impact rate acquisition (target system evaluation information)

TeamAttackEffectivity.Wiki: A value for determining the number of simultaneous attacks in a team. Increasing the value reduces the number of people who can participate in the attack at the same time.

disableDark.Wiki: Whether the alert vision_distance and battle start distance are not affected by the darkness

callHelp_CallValidMinDistTarget.AltName: Call Help - Valid Target Min Distance
callHelp_CallValidMinDistTarget.Wiki: If it is closer than this value, you cannot call a friend.

callHelp_CallValidRange.Wiki: Do not call if the companion is farther than this value.

callHelp_ForgetTimeByArrival.AltName: Call Help - Forget Time by Arrival

callHelp_MinWaitTime.Wiki: Minimum time for the first wait goal of the response goal [101 => 10.1sec]

callHelp_MaxWaitTime.Wiki: Maximum time for the first waiting goal of the response goal [101 => 10.1sec]

goalAction_ToCaution.Wiki: Goal action: Target becomes alert due to normal sound detection

callHelp_ReplyBehaviorType.Wiki: Action type to target position after response

disablePathMove.Wiki: Whether to move directly without following the path even if a path move command comes

skipArrivalVisibleCheck.Wiki: Do you want to skip the arrival judgment by the line of sight? When set to On, arrival judgment is performed even if the line of sight does not pass.

thinkAttr_doAdmirer.Wiki: Thinking attribute: When turned on, it plays a role of surrounding.

enableNaviFlg_Edge.Wiki: Can you pass through the node cliff? (def: 1)

enableNaviFlg_LargeSpace.Wiki: Can you pass through the node wide? (def: 1)

enableNaviFlg_Ladder.Wiki: Can you pass through the node ladder? (def: 0)

enableNaviFlg_Hole.Wiki: Can you go through the node hole? (def: 0)

enableNaviFlg_Door.Wiki: Can you pass through the node door? (def: 0)

enableNaviFlg_InSideWall.Wiki: Can you pass through the node in the wall? (def: 0)

enableNaviFlg_Lava.Wiki: Can you pass through the node lava? (def: 0)

enableNaviFlg_Edge_Ordinary.Wiki: Can you pass the node cliff under normal / alert conditions? (def: 1)

isUpdateBattleSight.Wiki: Do you want to overwrite the battle view?
